website_summaries.verdict: A unique option for holding backdrops when shooting on location or in small spaces.
pros: T-design of the backdrop stand reduces the amount of supports and crossbars needed for assembly
Horizontal bar detaches for quick disassembly when finished
cons: The single support of the stand can cause paper backdrops to crease in the middle

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy/worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you are doing a photo booth or using for photography, you won't be disappointed. This was a lower cost option for holding backdrops and this is worth buying. It looks like a tripod and a T and comes with 2 clips to hold hold the backdrop. I wasn't happy with the backdrop I bought but this item is great. It folds up and comes apart so it doesn't take up a lot of room to store or to transport. It has adjustable height so it works with different lengths. I wish I had this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: fulltimemom

customer_reviews.title: You spin me right round baby, right round!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backdrop for my tiny office, that was easy to set up and put away without taking up limited storage space. This fit the bill except that it wont stay still! There is no way to tighten it so it won't spin. If I had a wall to prop this up against I wouldn't have needed it in the first place. If you need a stable backdrop stand, do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Shanda Renee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Came in good time!!! Nothing wrong with it.!!! I will be using it for Youtube videos I will update later when I put more use to it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stand
customer_reviews.text: Some others talk about its easy to topple over or fall down. Well Ill be very honest this didnt happen to me at all. And I didnt have it leaning on a wall or anything. It held up just fine with no issues. And the back drop I had on it had extra room on the bottom and even when my office chair wheels rolled over it nothing happened. Also people complained about the clips. I also didnt have no issues. IDK if I got lucky. I will keep you guys updated if anything happens. But so far for my use it was amazing. I will recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at an affordable price.  Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and really helps me take good studio shots of things I'm selling online. I've bought multiple of these and highly recommend them. The only negative I could come up with is that it would be nice to have a bag to put this in (I'd be willing to pay more)...and I've found it difficult to make everything fit back in the box if I need to break the tripod down. Otherwise, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Senti it back
customer_reviews.text: While I could see how this may work for some it just didn't for me. Way too light weight to be practical and the clips just don't hold anything with any substance up. Maybe if you just used a sheet of linen, but anything more than light, sheer fabric wouldn't stay up. Returned it for a refund thanks to Amazon's great return policy!
customer_reviews.author: ebyoungva

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly, difficult to get a photographed background properly aligned
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put behind me for telehealth sessions while I'm working from home. The screw in the middle of the stand protrudes upwards, so it pokes into the background and puts a little bubble underneath in the middle of the top. Since I got a picture of a fence for the background, I was CONSTANTLY adjusting it to try to make it appear aligned properly on camera. It's a flimsy stand. Nothing to write home about. Worked for my purposes, but I'm glad I don't need to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstargrrl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed this for...to hang my back drops on!
customer_reviews.author: karmen haik

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to lighten my "equipment" load.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to reduce the equipment weight of some event type photography. Wanted to use it with a cloth wrinkle resistant 5x6 backdrop,but it really wasn't quite tall enough nor was I able to stretch the backdrop at the corners. However, it worked perfectly with a printed paper backdrop for a preschool. Lots of possible weak points (plastic and rivets) so I'd be particular. Liked the quick set up with the smaller sets/equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Space saving background stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular background stand, because it saves space vs most others which are 10 feet long, and include 2 stands instead of one. This stand its quite light, a plus and a minus. I attached a sand bag to it, which makes it very stable, also purchased at Amazon. Use them also for your lighter tripods.Super easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: melodymaker

customer_reviews.title: Compact size, holds 5'x3' backdrop with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is incredibly lightweight and takes up little space. I actually thought I didn't receive all of the pieces when it arrived, because it is so compact and it takes less than 1 minute to set it up. I didn't even read the directions - it's fairly self-explanatory. I wanted something to hold a 5'x3' backdrop for my online teaching, and this was amazing. It holds the backdrop (a lightweight vinyl) easily with the included clips, and there wasn't really an issue with balance or weight. Very impressed with this product! I was hoping to avoid the huge backdrop holders due to room constraints. This fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: PipsPlusOne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It's not bulky like the other stands with two poles. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: aShoppingGoddess

customer_reviews.title: My order did not include clips
customer_reviews.text: Item received without clips. I now have to purchase clips separately when the reason I purchased this specific brand was because it came with clips.
customer_reviews.author: liliv1717

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The stand is easy to put together and move when not using. However it isnt very sturdy. I'm not sure if I'm missing a piece but the vertical bar sits straight on top of the horizontal and you just screw something over it to hold it in place, however the vertical piece will wiggle and turn back and forth because the screw doesn't hold tight enough. I find myself having to fight with it sometimes to get it to sit still
customer_reviews.author: Me92

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Using for my daughters baby shower coming up in April.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Magin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and break down. Does a great job holding my green screen. I'd love it if it was another foot or two wider, but maybe I'll figure something out to widen it. Do yourself a favor and get some velcro straps to hold the separate pieces together for easier storage or transport. Overall an easy product to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!! It’s worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was by far the best few dollars I’ve spent! Very sturdy! It adjusts just find! It does come with directions but to me it was self explanatory to put together. I received everything in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine W.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It works but not really stable. compact size for the back drop
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my streaming room
customer_reviews.text: if you have a special place in the house, where the wife cannot talk your ears off or assign you to many chores around the house that are tedious and meant to keep you busy. A place where a beer and posters of pamela anderson with her ta ta's in glorious splendor be displayed for all men to oogle in admiration. The man cave is my safe haven and this was a great addition to it so thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Okay Stand - But NO Clamps
customer_reviews.text: The stand is okay. Easy assembly and lightweight enough to make it easy to work with. However, the package DID NOT INCLUDE THE FOUR CLAMPS as advertised. All I received was the stand, zero clamps.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: This unit worked perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hold a green screen cloth as a background for my web cam live stream. It is very well made and easy to put up and take down. The only negative about the whole thing is the clips supplied. I think there must be a better design. But I use my own clips any way because I needed more than the 4 supplied.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricy but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office for when we have to take product images for ebay sales. Only reason i got it was because its easily collapsible. for my small remote office in brooklyn space is key so anything to bulky is no good. This is able to do the trick. it was a bit expensive but other than that it does what it should
customer_reviews.author: Hea597

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and adjust. Was looking for something to hold pretty backdrops for my jewelry photos (I use a mannequin bust most of the time) and this is perfect. It's up in a couple minutes, then when I don't need it goes back in the bag and takes very little storage room
customer_reviews.author: Doina "Day" Berndt dba Kalyana Design

customer_reviews.title: Specify the width clearly. It’s not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough. The hight is specified clearly the width isn’t. I had to fold my back drop which took away from the design and overall made my back drop look horrible ..
customer_reviews.author: Twanna Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a birthday party and it was a hit! It was an incredibly easy setup. It took less than 5 minutes. It is very lightweight but sturdy. People kept hitting into it and it stood strong. It breaks down to a compact size for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Holding a 7x5 backdrop. It was easy to assemble and very lightweight. I will have it against a wall so I'm not too worried about it falling over. Its holding up comfortably. I like that it breaks down small enough to store.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Leon Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold a white photo sheet for my online teaching. It says it’s for photo backgrounds but it works for this too. It’s really light weight and was easy to assemble. It’s not super high quality, but it works and it’s affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy product for the price. Personally I would have preferred it be cheaper for the quality but its worth the buy. It is fairly simple to assemble out of the box! So setting it up and putting it away is no problem! I bought it for setting it up as a backdrop for neutral background for virtual classes and meetings. It has been a great buy for me, as there arent unnecessary destractions while I am on video calls. Recommend it for anyone trying to work from home during current times and want to have a more professional setting!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We needed a portable stand for a paper backdrop for my daughter and this was perfect. She competed in National History day and, as she did well, this went with her to the State competition and then on the bus with her for the National competition in DC.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Stable and sturdy stand.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kiddos that are doing distance learning with this Covid thing. I have them sitting in my breakfast area facing away from each other and used a “green screen” (purchased separately) and this stand to separate them and to give them a different background for their Zoom classes. So far it’s working great. Once they go back to school I will use it for my business. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Get a good sandbag
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clip on a fabric background for work. Or even a sound blanket when i need to record. Super easy to set up but be sure to use sturdy clips, and have a sand bag at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: All the tools are in the box and very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my vlogs and various meetings with various backdrops. It was so easy to assemble and it is light weight, yet sturdy. You can move it anywhere without a problem. I’m so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: #1WhoDatFan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to create a faux wall for a little storage nook. It worked perfectly. It’s sturdy enough and the fabric I bought hangs beautifully. It assembled quickly and easily and is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight, not real tall, easy to put together but will easily blow over. This would be good to use to hold backdrops for children. I tried using it with high school seniors and it would have been nice to be about 6 inches taller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, felt it when i picked it up
customer_reviews.text: Nice. firm and sturdy. knew it as soon as i picked it up. Confirmed when i put it together. But I didn't get any of the clamps. Sturdy stand but no clamps. Pretty upset, more sad though lol
customer_reviews.author: Sikimus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I'm a makeup instagrammer and this is awesome for your backdrop or to hang things up that you would like in your photos! Easy to assemble and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was quick all pieces were good with no damage
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick all pieces were good with no damage. I was looking for a lightweight backdrop stand for themed parties and this does the trick. I buy vinyl/cloth backfrops and not a problem with tipping at all. Granted this stand is designed for mobile uses so it by no means is for multiple heavy backdrops. This is perfect for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: For the cost it proformed good only thing I didn’t like was the fact that the two stick connect in the middle with a bump sticking out where you connect them you screw it so they stay made my back drop look weird in the middle had to play around with butterflies so it wouldn’t look weird but over all for what I paid it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Since the covid shutdown, I have been working from home. I had a backdrop printed for me, the previous stand I got was okay but couldn't be adjusted just right, this fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nickola A Whittle

customer_reviews.title: Pieces bent
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this would have been a nice stand had all the pieces not have been delivered bent. Like many of the reviews previously stated the assembly and use is impossible with missing or bent pieces/parts. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy easy! I wish it came with a bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Pugh Talks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and easy
customer_reviews.text: I use it for when I stream gaming. I have a pop up green/blue chroma key backdrop that has some decent weight. As long as the stand doesn't get bumped too hard it hold it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good buy....beware top cross bar will move occasionally though.
customer_reviews.text: The build is pretty sturdy, however, it doesn't hold still at the top. The wing nut that holds the horizontal bar at the top doesn't hold it in place well. Occasionally the fan I have running will turn my green screen because the wing nut somehow gets loose. If I have it against the wall I'm sure it would not move, though I have mine set up in the middle of the room.
customer_reviews.author: John Garcia Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Brought it as a gift for a friends son. He likes to do stop motion videos. Great product for green screen fabric. Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Matthews

customer_reviews.title: I like the backdrop but 2 clips were broken
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the backdrop; it definitely serve its purpose. It is sturdy. It would be good if the clips could be the same color of the stand/poles instead of the shiny silver that sticks out like a sore thumb. I gave it a 3 star because 2 of the 4 clips came broken and I needed to use today to hang a banner with my logo for an event today. So I have to go to the store to find a similar clip that would work to hold up the banner. I have sent a note to the seller to send replacement clips
customer_reviews.author: Chef Yadira

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and move.
customer_reviews.text: The stand is easy to setup and reposition as needed. The clamps provided do not fit the cross members. Had to purchase another set of clamps.
customer_reviews.author: David Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It was a breeze to assemble, came with 4 clips, and it’s very easy to adjust the height. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble/store
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, and folds up to store easily. I'm very happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: cheeseguppy

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what you'd expect. I purchased it so I could fabricate a backdrop for some video trainings. Perfect for that! Best if you are sitting in your video. This frame extends, but I found it was a tight fit for a standing video.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality except there a big long bolt in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality except there a big long bolt in the middle of the crossbar. For a paper backdrop this usually creates a freakin crease. Very irritating
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!!! Fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for photo booths and photo shoots!!! Exactly as described!!! Fast shipping!! Great value for price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to hold backdrops for a gigging musician
customer_reviews.text: I use this for virtual open mike nights on Zoom when I need a background that doesn't blank out,
customer_reviews.author: John K. Druitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is very easy to assemble and is sturdy. The clips are very convenient for hanging fabric on the top and the stand itself doesn’t take up too much space. Great for recording video, taking photos and other content. I love that it’s not too heavy so traveling with it won’t be a hassle. I’m very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Imani Shanté

customer_reviews.title: The Best Stand Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it not small at all but it can be adjusted for little background options great buy for the price !
customer_reviews.author: TINIKA

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need anything too big and bulky. great width coverage. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Also compact enough to transport. I keep it in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on location backdrops
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on location backdrops. Perfect for two people but have fit as many as four in front of it. Wish it was a foot wider. Going to DIY that myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rego

customer_reviews.title: Easy ro setup, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to set up! And it is very light weight and easy to take apart and store. I love it. Im definitely going to recommend this product to my friends and followers.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia A.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: The spring inside broke only used maybe 6 or 7 times. Better to use one that has sides rather then a stand like a T shape.
customer_reviews.author: Rita0904

customer_reviews.title: Not portable! Comes without a case!
customer_reviews.text: No carrying case....not so portable!!! Besides that, it is easy to assemble and works well with LIGHTWEIGHT backdrops.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend 👌
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my needs. Easy to assemble as one person. Perfect size for 5x7 backdrops. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mishon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great! I use it to film tutorials in my home and I love it. It’s super easy to store and set up
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, fragile and arrived with a broken clamp
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with a broken clip-holder (only 3 were in operating conditions) and the rest may not last long because of the fragile material. The base and crossbar were easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For What I Need!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since I'm a streamer and needed something to prop up my green screen, it's a good big size, sturdy, and holds up my green screen just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I do an online home business and I use it for my backdrop. Works great for that purpose

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Useful
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed for my photo shoot. It was super easy to assemble & to break down to put away too.

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dented. Tipping over. Needed for photoshoot today. Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble got the job done only thing I didn’t like was it needed more weight to it. Very light weight and keep falling over

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I used a shower curtain for a backdrop on this "T" stand! It looked so good! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Weight too light and out fabric backdrop kept making the stand fall. We wished the material was a bit heavier.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and adjust.  Not very sturdy if you are using it outside.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of it to put together but I was using it outside and you have to secure it to something or it will blow over as it is light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for parties
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this portable T stand. I would recommend this to anyone who is interested. I will be ordering again.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay in place it’s hard to use because it’s always moving around other than that it was OK

customer_reviews.title: The clamps down clamp on all the way! But good product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s super easy to assemble and is very light weight and portable, but that clamps it came with do not reach all the way around the pole so I’m having difficulty clamping them to my greenscreen. The clamps aren’t the same as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ritz

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Most of the included clips for this item came to me broken. Had I not needed it the next day, I would have returned it and spent a little more money to get one that was sturdier and more reliable. This product is poorly made and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: lauren fodor

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the order!!
customer_reviews.text: Order this T backdrop because I wanted something to cover what was behind me. Loved the fact that it came w the clips to hold any drop you have. I love that it’s adjustable I learned the hard way! I didn’t even know it could go higher! I am very pleased it’s metal w metal clips so it feel durable

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was exactly what i needed!! I am extremely pleased wit hit! Very easy to assemble and serves the purpose intended for! If you are thinking about ordering this I urge you to you wont be disappointed!

customer_reviews.text: Worked well for me to add green screen for my Zoom meetings.

customer_reviews.text: It's doing what it intended to do, it just works.

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. Stands are as I expected and will fill my needs nicely.

customer_reviews.text: Stable perfectly and worth it however u need to get some hooks.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t sturdy at all but for the price I guess you get what you pay for. Two of the four clamps cane broken but I didn’t send it back as I needed the item for usage the next day.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t use this outdoors. It won’t stand up to the lightest breeze. Indoors it was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made one gust of wind and it was on the ground waste pf money

customer_reviews.title: A great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: It certainly could get knocked over but its easy to set up, collapses small, and was a steal.

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight stand for home use !
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight stand for home use. Great for back grounds to make your videos. Easy to set it up and stores any place. Not to big to store.

customer_reviews.text: I got my son this with his green screen from Christmas. The only thing is one of the brackets was broken and I couldn't fix it.
